main event: Two objects were observed in the night sky, one traveling northeast and the other southeast, appearing to be a meteor or comet.
interesting points: The objects were moving too fast to follow with the naked eye, trailing with lines as they moved across the sky., One of the objects was assumed to reappear heading southeast about 15 minutes later., The sighting took place in North Platte, Nebraska at night., The observer reported the object appearing to glow with a bluish-white light., A handwritten letter from a twelve-year-old interested in UFOs was included, inquiring about similar sightings.
sighted object: two fast-moving objects in the night sky
witness description: a twelve-year-old civilian who observed the objects through a telescope
